data.title: Actor Hiten Tejwani Biography, Career and Facts
data.meta_description: In this article we are going to talk about the biography, career, notable works, and family of Actor Hiten Tejwani so read till end.
data.text:
Hiten Tejwani Biography and Career

Hiten Tejwani is an Indian television actor known for his performances in serials like Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi, Kutumb and Pavitra Rishta. Tejwani was born on 5 March 1974. In this article we are going to talk about the biography, career, notable works, TV shows and family of Actor Hiten Tejwani so read the article till the end.

Career

Hiten Tejwani played a role in Ekta Kapoor’s serial Ghar Ek Mandir which aired on Sony TV. After this, Kapoor appeared in Kabhi Soutan Kabhi Saheli on Metro Gold, Kahin Kisi Roz on Star Plus and Kutumb on Sony TV with Gauri Pradhan.

He re-appeared with Pradhan in the second season of Kutumb, and Kapoor cast the same pairing in his show Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi. When Kutumb ended, he was offered the role of Karan Virani in Kapoor’s series Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi on Star Plus.

In 2009, he and his wife also made a small cameo in the Star Plus show Kumkum – Ek Pyara Sa Bandhan. In 2006, Tejwani participated in the second season of Nach Baliye 2 along with his wife Gauri and returned to host Season 4 in 2008.

He played the role of Anurag Basu in Kasautii Zindagii Kay, replacing Cezanne Khan in the role.

TV Appearance

Hiten Tejwani is a famous television and film celebrity and he worked in so many movies, this biography article is incomplete without talking about his films. So here you will gain info about his films and projects.

In 2009 and 2010, she played small or supporting roles in Jasuben Jayantilal Joshi’s Joint Family and Kitni Mohabbat Hai on NDTV Imagine, Palampur Express on Sony TV, Choti Bahu – Sindoor Bin Suhagan on Zee TV and Rang Badalti Odhani on Star. One.

In 2011 he appeared as Vicky Oberoi in Mukti Bandhan, where he played the antagonist. Later that year, he was cast again by Kapoor as the lead actor of Pavitra Rishta on Zee TV.

Tejwani was nominated for Best Actor in a Lead Role at the Zee Rishtey Awards, The Global Indian Film & TV Honours, 5th Boroplus Gold Awards, 11th Indian Telly Awards and 12th Indian Television Academy Awards. Kya Hua Tera Vaada in the role of Jatin Chopra. He appeared in the Sri Lankan television series Pooja playing the role of a doctor.

In 2013, he appeared as Murali in Sanskar – Dharohar Apno Ki. He later played the role of Nitin Joshi in Colors TV’s Meri Aashiqui Tum Se Hi.

In 2015, Tejwani played the role of Dr. Anant in Balika Vadhu. And also played the role of Niranjan Chaturvedi in Ganga from 2015 to 2017.

In 2017, Tejwani was a celebrity contestant in Bigg Boss 11, the Indian version of the reality TV show Bigg Boss, which premiered on 1 October. He lived for 11 weeks until he was evicted on 17 December (Day 77).

In 2018, he appeared in Colors TV’s show Tantra where he played the role of Inspector Bharat Singh Rathore.

In 2019, he played the role of Viraj Roy in &TV’s Daayan. As of February 2019, he was a contestant of Kitchen Champion 5 along with his wife Gauri Pradhan Tejwani. Tejwani will play the role of a professor in the upcoming film Nobel Peace.

Short biography of Hiten Tejwani

Hiten Tejwani and his wife Gauri Pradhan during the shooting of an advertisement for Breeze soap in Hyderabad. Later, they met on the sets of the tele-series Kutumb and were incidentally cast as the lead pair. The onscreen chemistry sparked a romance between them and they started dating. Playing star-cross lovers Karan and Nandini in another daily soap Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi, they decided to get married.

After a courtship of two years, they got married on 29 April 2004 at the Sun-N-Sand Hotel in Pune in a private ceremony as per Maharashtrian customs, attended by around 40-50 guests. Soon after, they went to Ko Samui, Thailand for their honeymoon. His reception was held on 9 May 2004 at the Army Club in Juhu, with more than 400 guests.

On 11 November 2009, they became parents when Pradhan gave birth to twins, a son and a daughter, at Lilavati Hospital, Bandra, Mumbai.

Also Read: Actor and Director Rishab Shetty Biography and Career

Short biography facts about Hiten Tejwani

He is a Mumbai based actor blessed with good looks and immense talent.

He usually pairs with Gauri Pradhan who is a very beautiful and talented actress.

They both have worked in a very successful daily sitcom, Kutum, on Sony Television, India.

Instagram

He is quite popular on Instagram and can be reached at hitentejwani on Instagram. His account has been followed by over 600k people.

We hope this biography article of Hiten Tejwani will be helpful for you to understand his journey and works.
